meanings.definition: To expel (a foreigner) from a country.
meanings.sent1: The government deports illegal immigrants who do not have proper documentation.
meanings.sent2: The country deports individuals who have overstayed their visas.
meanings.sent3: The airport security guard jokingly said he would deport anyone without a boarding pass.
meanings.sent4: Her strict parents deport any unruly behavior from their household.
meanings.sent5: The strict immigration laws ensure that the country deports those who do not follow the rules.
